author: Liz Marie

text: As we wrap up an incredible year, I thought it would be the perfect time to reflect on some of the most-loved and most-used products in our home this year. These treasures are not only beautifully functional but also come at prices that rival even the biggest sale days of the year. If you’re still on the hunt for that perfect gift or a treat for yourself, this roundup might have exactly what you need. Let’s dive into the favorites that stole the show in 2024!For the Kitchen Enthusiasts1. Carote 14-Piece Knife SetThis knife set combines elegance with utility. Its pearl white finish and ergonomic handles make prepping meals a joy. Plus, it’s dishwasher safe!2. Carote 17-Piece Nonstick Cookware SetThe ultimate solution for easy cooking and storage! These nonstick pans with removable handles are perfect for small spaces without compromising quality.3. Beautiful 6-Qt Programmable Slow Cooker by Drew BarrymoreThis slow cooker’s stunning cornflower blue design isn’t just pretty—it’s programmable and reliable, making weeknight dinners effortless. Decor That Feels Like Home4. Brass-Trimmed Fluted Glass Picture FrameTimeless elegance for displaying cherished memories. This brass frame is a subtle yet sophisticated addition to any room.5. Better Homes & Gardens Floral Jute Accent RugA cozy layer with character, this rug’s jute texture and floral design bring warmth and charm to your space.6. Round Tapered Tray from Threshold x Studio McGeeThis versatile tray is perfect for styling coffee tables, organizing essentials, or showcasing seasonal décor.7. Lumbar Floral Pillow with FlangeAdding texture and a splash of color, this pillow was a go-to for creating layered, cozy spaces this year.8. Metal Tea Tin by Hearth & Hand™ with MagnoliaTea storage has never looked so chic! Its vintage-inspired design is both functional and decorative.9. Callista Wicker Club ChairA must-have for indoor or outdoor spaces, this chair brings texture and relaxation wherever it goes.10. Large Floral Canvas Storage BasketStylish and functional, this basket is a lifesaver for keeping clutter at bay while adding charm to any corner.11. Better Homes & Gardens Chunky Knit ThrowNothing says cozy quite like a chunky knit throw! This one was a staple for movie nights and chilly mornings. Best from My Very Own Curated Cozy Cottage Collection at QVCThis year, I had the joy of curating a collection with QVC that embodies the heart of cozy living. Here are the standout pieces from my Cozy Cottage Collection:Set of 3 Resin MushroomsA whimsical addition to any shelf, mantel, or garden-inspired vignette. Ceramic Serving PlatterThis versatile platter features a subtle design that’s perfect for entertaining or everyday use. Asparagus Ceramic PitcherPlayful yet timeless, this pitcher is perfect for serving or as a unique vase for fresh blooms. Set of 2 Vintage Mirror TraysThese trays are ideal for creating layered displays or organizing small treasures. 8.7″ Indoor/Outdoor Ceramic PlanterA charming planter that seamlessly transitions between indoor coziness and outdoor beauty. Set of 2 Large & Small Glass ClochesPerfect for creating seasonal displays or showcasing your favorite collectibles. These pieces are so near and dear to my heart, and I hope they bring a touch of cozy charm to your home as well. Thank you so much for stopping by the blog this past year of 2024. Projects were slow but meaningful, and we look forward to continuing to bring more content from favorite finds, DIY projects, home renovation tips, and more. Thank you, 2024, and cheers to 2025.Thank you again for stopping by the blog; keep up with us daily HERE.Stay Cozy!xxLizMarie
html:
As we wrap up an incredible year, I thought it would be the perfect time to reflect on some of the most-loved and most-used products in our home this year. These treasures are not only beautifully functional but also come at prices that rival even the biggest sale days of the year. If you’re still on the hunt for that perfect gift or a treat for yourself, this roundup might have exactly what you need. Let’s dive into the favorites that stole the show in 2024!

For the Kitchen Enthusiasts

1. Carote 14-Piece Knife Set
This knife set combines elegance with utility. Its pearl white finish and ergonomic handles make prepping meals a joy. Plus, it’s dishwasher safe!

2. Carote 17-Piece Nonstick Cookware Set
The ultimate solution for easy cooking and storage! These nonstick pans with removable handles are perfect for small spaces without compromising quality.

3. Beautiful 6-Qt Programmable Slow Cooker by Drew Barrymore
This slow cooker’s stunning cornflower blue design isn’t just pretty—it’s programmable and reliable, making weeknight dinners effortless.

Decor That Feels Like Home

4. Brass-Trimmed Fluted Glass Picture Frame
Timeless elegance for displaying cherished memories. This brass frame is a subtle yet sophisticated addition to any room.

5. Better Homes & Gardens Floral Jute Accent Rug
A cozy layer with character, this rug’s jute texture and floral design bring warmth and charm to your space.

6. Round Tapered Tray from Threshold x Studio McGee
This versatile tray is perfect for styling coffee tables, organizing essentials, or showcasing seasonal décor.

7. Lumbar Floral Pillow with Flange
Adding texture and a splash of color, this pillow was a go-to for creating layered, cozy spaces this year.

8. Metal Tea Tin by Hearth & Hand™ with Magnolia
Tea storage has never looked so chic! Its vintage-inspired design is both functional and decorative.

9. Callista Wicker Club Chair
A must-have for indoor or outdoor spaces, this chair brings texture and relaxation wherever it goes.

10. Large Floral Canvas Storage Basket
Stylish and functional, this basket is a lifesaver for keeping clutter at bay while adding charm to any corner.

11. Better Homes & Gardens Chunky Knit Throw
Nothing says cozy quite like a chunky knit throw! This one was a staple for movie nights and chilly mornings.

Best from My Very Own Curated Cozy Cottage Collection at QVC

This year, I had the joy of curating a collection with QVC that embodies the heart of cozy living. Here are the standout pieces from my Cozy Cottage Collection:

  • Set of 3 Resin Mushrooms
    A whimsical addition to any shelf, mantel, or garden-inspired vignette.
  • Ceramic Serving Platter
    This versatile platter features a subtle design that’s perfect for entertaining or everyday use.
  • Asparagus Ceramic Pitcher
    Playful yet timeless, this pitcher is perfect for serving or as a unique vase for fresh blooms.
  • Set of 2 Vintage Mirror Trays
    These trays are ideal for creating layered displays or organizing small treasures.
  • 8.7″ Indoor/Outdoor Ceramic Planter
    A charming planter that seamlessly transitions between indoor coziness and outdoor beauty.
  • Set of 2 Large & Small Glass Cloches
    Perfect for creating seasonal displays or showcasing your favorite collectibles.

These pieces are so near and dear to my heart, and I hope they bring a touch of cozy charm to your home as well. Thank you so much for stopping by the blog this past year of 2024. Projects were slow but meaningful, and we look forward to continuing to bring more content from favorite finds, DIY projects, home renovation tips, and more. Thank you, 2024, and cheers to 2025.Thank you again for stopping by the blog; keep up with us daily HERE.

Stay Cozy!
xxLizMarie
